Prerequisite(s): Two Piercing Thunder maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: 1 round

Description

By digging in his heels and launching of like a speeding comet, the disciple of the Piercing Thunder is capable of lightning fast sprints for a short period of time. After initiating this boost, your base land speed increases by 30 feet until the start of your next turn. This adjustment is treated as an enhancement bonus. In addition, you can immediately move up to your speed as a free action. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
